p: Numerous real-time RT-PCR methods have been developed for rapid detection of RVFV [ 103â€“ 106]. The detection limit of these assays is typically between 10 and 100 genome copies. An alternative approach is the use of reverse transcription loop-mediated isothermal amplification (RT-LAMP) technique [ 107, 108]. The detection limits of RT-LAMP assays are comparable to real-time RT-PCR.
